segments.text: This overflowing sink is absolutely revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water just cascading down like that, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the puddle—gross, she'll slip for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate, totally ignoring the filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those dirty cabinet doors with water streaming over them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, climbing around in this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand in the cookie jar—hope it's clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's unstable, but they're making it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, probably tracking water too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor's a slippery hazard now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden looks pristine, unlike this pigsty inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a nice kitchen ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off that faucet before it's unbearable.
segments.speaker: PAR
